name: Water Rush (itch)
description:
This is a third person underwater shooter where you will need to go through a dangerous path to escape an enemy that you don't seem to know yourself...

By being in this position you have no choice but to listen to strange voice in a radio  who seems to be willing to help you find an exit from this place.

This is a 3 to 5 minute linear experience of the first chapter of the game, that's still work in progress.

The game was made by me using assets from unity store.

Hope you like it!
